cleaned_text: an effective cleansing supplement that is easy to take? No bitter-tasting juices or bad-tasting powders here! Introducing 7-DAY CLEANSE by NU-TEK Nutrition®. This convenient yet potent cleanse features concentrated amounts of key herbs and botanicals, such as Cascara Sagrada, Senna, Burdock, Aloe, Rhubarb, Slippery Elm, Peppermint, and more - all packed into a four-capsule serving taken twice daily for a gentle and fast-acting cleanse for both men and women. Many health-conscious individuals use a cleanse for a variety of reasons: they want to look and feel great for a special event coming up, they need to reset after splurging during the holidays or a weeklong vacation, or they want to jump-start their fitness or weight-loss journey. Whatever your reason, 7-DAY CLEANSE could be just what you need to get things moving in the right direction and take on the world! As with any cleanse, it's important to drink plenty of water when taking this product. For even greater results, try stacking it with [Diucor](https://www.nutrishopusa.com/products/katalyst-nutraceuticals/diucor) and [Fiber4](https://www.nutrishopusa.com/products/trailhead-nutrition/modern-source-fiber4). Get to feeling clean and fresh again with 7-DAY CLEANSE. SUGGESTED USE: As an adult dietary supplement, take 4 capsules twice daily. Drink 8-10 glasses of water per day. Do not use for more than 7 consecutive days. Do not exceed daily recommended dosage. This product is only intended for adults, 18 years of age or older. NOTICE: This product contains aloe vera, cascara, rhubarb, and senna. Read and follow directions carefully. Do not use if you have or develop diarrhea, loose stools, or abdominal pain because aloe vera, cascara, rhubarb, and senna may worsen these conditions and be harmful to your health. Consult your physician if you have frequent diarrhea or if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medication, or have a medical condition. ALLERGY INFORMATION: Manufactured in a facility that processes milk, eggs, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, and soy.
